column1: Rule 1: Modifiers containing both an amino group (-NH2) and a carboxylic acid group
column2: Rule 2: Modifiers with a phenyl group attached to a carboxylic acid group and electron-donating groups
column3: Rule 3: Modifiers containing a sulfur group and a carboxylic acid group
column4: Rule 4: Modifiers with a pyridine ring and a carboxylic acid group
column5: Rule 5: Modifiers with multiple hydroxyl groups and a carboxylic acid group
column6: Rule 6: Modifiers with a nitro group attached to a phenyl ring with a carboxylic acid group
column7: Rule 7: Modifiers with a formyl group attached to a phenyl ring with a carboxylic acid group
column8: Rule 8: Modifiers with a trifluoromethyl group attached to a carboxylic acid group
column9: Rule 9: Modifiers with a methoxy group attached to an ether chain with a carboxylic acid group
column10: Rule 10: Modifiers with a long aliphatic chain with a carboxylic acid group
column11: Rule 11: Modifiers with a phenyl group attached to a carboxylic acid group and an electron-withdrawing group
column12: Rule 12: Modifiers with a phenyl group and a carboxylic acid group, but without additional electron-donating groups
column13: Rule 13: Modifiers with a carboxylic acid group and a long ether chain
column14: Rule 14: Modifiers containing an amino group (-NH2) and a phenyl group without a carboxylic acid group
column15: Rule 15: Modifiers with a benzofuran structure and a carboxylic acid group
